# Host Docs

> Documentation for Host Docs.

*Topics available: 25*

- [Orleans clients](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/client.md): Learn how to write .NET Orleans clients.
- [Grain directory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/grain-directory.md): Learn about the grain directory in .NET Orleans.
- [Heterogeneous silos overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/heterogeneous-silos.md): Learn an overview of heterogeneous silos in .NET Orleans.
- [PowerShell client module](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/powershell-client.md): Learn about the PowerShell client module in .NET Orleans.
- [Orleans silo lifecycles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/silo-lifecycle.md): Learn about .NET Orleans silo lifecycles.

## Subtopics

- [Orleans configuration guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/configuration-guide/llms.txt): 17 topics; Orleans configuration guide documentation and reference.
- [Orleans observability](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/orleans/host/monitoring/llms.txt): 3 topics; Orleans observability documentation and reference.
